items.title: 3D Master, from zero to hero Vol.5: Head Anatomy
items.headline: Understands the bases of the Head Human Anatomy for the creation of high quality 3D characters.

You'll apply the concepts about human anatomy independently regarding: The mouth, the nose, and the ear.
We'll finally create a realistic face of a man, taking proportions into account, used on artistic jobs, for you get a better result.
